250414更新日志:
新增快速搜索
搜索关键词：x:我的     小说搜索
搜索关键词：m:我的     漫画搜索
搜索关键词：t:我的      听书搜索
搜索关键词：d:我的     短剧搜索
搜索关键词：我的        根据自定义模式搜索

250416更新日志:
新增快速搜索
书籍名@来源
目前支持来源：番茄、七猫、得间、QQ、熊猫、塔读、69书吧、伪69、喜马拉雅、小米、猫眼、百度、米读、顶点、星星小说、笔趣阁22、爱下电子书、搜书神器、得奇

250428更新日志:
新增河马短剧，七猫短剧

250416更新日志:
恢复69书吧使用:www.69shuba.com
由于搜索可靠性不高，可能搜索时间较长，故不加入全部搜索，请点击69书吧搜索使用

250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增大灰狼书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和大灰狼书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在大灰狼书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

250213更新日志:
新增塔读，69书吧，笔趣阁，喜马拉雅
新增大灰狼书架同步功能(书籍详情页刷新同步)

250214更新日志:
新增小米阅读，修复登录失效的问题

250218更新日志:
新增百度免费小说，新增猫眼免费小说，新增下载提醒

250218更新日志:
新增歪瑞古德漫画

250227更新日志:
开放安卓端短剧模式

250302更新日志:
修复切换服务器后目录加载失败的问题

250302更新日志:
修复bug

250304更新日志:

250309更新日志:
修复部分书籍目录加载失败的问题
bookSourceGroup: 番茄小说,七猫小说,塔读小说,得间小说,起点小说
exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

function getFanqieCookie() {
    try {
        return String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || '');
    } catch (e) {
        return '';
    }
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '男频';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '小说';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '番茄';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var fqsjurl = (getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken).replace(/=/g, '%3D');
if (!fqsjurl) {
    java.toast('您还未登陆番茄账号，无法同步数据哦！');
    }
fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&cookie=" + fqsjurl;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';
var hasValidCookie = getFanqieCookie().length > 0;

if (device === 'android' && hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var cookieParam = encodeURIComponent(getFanqieCookie());
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie=" + cookieParam;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);
            
            if (!(response && response.data)) {
                  }

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + value.join(","),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("分组获取失败: " + e.message);
                    }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("正在加载分组数据...");
        var sessionid = cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid") || '';
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?sessionid=" + encodeURIComponent(sessionid);
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);
        
        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : '未知用户';
        infoData = [{
            title: userName + "个人中心",
            url: "",
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
            }
        }];
        
        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("操作失败: " + e.message);
            }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl =  `${base_url}/discover_style?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.style_list || [];
    java.toast(result.msg);
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("发现样式获取失败");
}

var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
//java.log(123);
let book_id = result.book_id;
let sources = result.source;
let tab = result.tab;
let book_tts = result.book_tts;
let tags = result.tags;
let role = result.role;
let last_chapter_title = result.last_chapter_title;
let last_chapter_update_time = result.last_chapter_update_time;
let word_number = result.word_number;
let status = result.status;
let score = result.score;
let media = result.media;
let abstract = result.abstract;
let book_review = result.book_review;
let copyright_info = result.copyright_info;
java.put('book_detail',JSON.stringify(result));
let info;
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key = '';

try {
	key = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key = getKey(key);
        } catch (e) {key='';}
if (key != ''){key = '✅️已登录';} else {key = '‼️⛔️您还未登录大灰狼账号哦，可以点击右上角登录♨️';}
info = `  🎚当前服务器：${base_url}
🪄大灰狼账号：${key}
🎴当前来源：${sources}
🗂当前模式：${tab}\n`
if (tab =='听书') {info = info+	'🔊当前音色：'+ getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id',String(source.bookSourceComment))+'\n'+book_tts+'\n‎';}
if (`${tags}`) {info = info +  `🕹分类：${tags}\n`};
if (`${role}`) {info = info +  `🎗书籍主角：${role}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_title}`) {info = info +  `🎯最新章节：${last_chapter_title}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_update_time}`) {info = info +  `⏳更新时间：${last_chapter_update_time}\n`};
if (`${word_number}`) {info = info +  `📝书籍字数：${word_number}\n`};
if (`${status}`) {info = info +  `💥书籍状态：${status}\n`};
if (`${score}`) {info = info +  `✨书籍评分：${score}\n`};
if (`${media}`) {info = info +  `📌出版媒体：${media}\n`};
if (`${abstract}`) {info = info +  `‎
📚书籍简介：
${abstract}\n`};
if (`${book_review}`) {info = info +  `‎\n${book_review}\n`};
if (`${copyright_info}`) {info = info +  `📍${copyright_info}`};
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.book_name
ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
let book_id = result.book_id;
let sources = result.source;
let tab = result.tab || '小说';
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let sq_user_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'sq_user_id',String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '0';
`${base_url}/catalog?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&sq_user_id=${sq_user_id}`
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>

let res =java.hexDecodeToString(result).split('大灰狼融合2.1');

let item_id = res[0];
let tab = res[1];
let title = res[2];
let sources = res[3];
let tone_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key2 = '';
try {
	key2 = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key2 = getKey(key2);
        } catch (e) {key2='';} 
let device,device_type;
try {
    device = java.androidId();
    device_type='安卓';
} catch (e) {
    try{
device = java.deviceID();
device_type='苹果';
}catch (e) {device = '';
device_type='安卓';
}
}
let sq_user_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'sq_user_id',String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '0';

let content_url;
if (tab=='小说') {
	content_url= `/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&sq_user_id=${sq_user_id}&key=${key2}&version=3`;
 } 
 else if (tab=='听书') {
 	 	content_url= `/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&tone_id=${tone_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key2}&version=3`;
 	} else if (tab=='漫画') {
 		 	content_url=	`/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key2}&version=3`;
 		} else if (tab=='短剧') {
 		content_url=	`/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key2}&version=3`;
 			}
 let data = java.ajax(base_url+content_url);
 try {
if (JSON.parse(data).msg) {
	java.toast(JSON.parse(data).msg);
	}}catch (e) {}
data = JSON.parse(data);
let content = decrypt(data.content);
data = JSON.stringify({'content':content});
//java.log(decrypt(data.content));
if (device_type=='安卓' && tab  == '短剧'){
	data = {'content':`【右上角刷新】开启播放(下一集请切换下一章刷新)\n播放直链：\n${content}`}
	data = JSON.stringify(data);
	 if (book.durChapterIndex===chapter.index){
	 //let b64 = java.base64Encode(generateVideoPage(title,content));
	// let dataUrl = `data:text/html;base64,${b64}`;
	// 	java.startBrowser(dataUrl,title);
	 	java.startBrowser(content,title);
	 	java.toast('正在加载视频...');
	}};

data;
</js>

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}
	//如果要显示最新章节，请去除注释，去除会影响搜索速度
//if ('{{$.source}}'=='番茄'){
//	'番茄:'+fq_last();
//	} else if ('{{$.source}}'=='七猫'){
//	'七猫:'+qm_last();
//	} else {
	'{{$.source}} {{$.last_chapter_title}}'
//		}

</js>

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
let tab = result.tab;
let sources = result.source;
let title = result.title;
let item_id = result.item_id;

let content_url = `${item_id}大灰狼融合2.1${tab}大灰狼融合2.1${title}大灰狼融合2.1${sources}`;
content_url= java.base64Encode(content_url);
content_url= `data:;base64,${content_url},{"type":"qingtian"}`;
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key2 = '';
try {
	key2 = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key2 = getKey(key2);
        } catch (e) {key2='';}


let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source',String(source.bookSourceComment));
if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media',String(source.bookSourceComment));
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  const parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&key=${key2}`
</js>
